statements.select: select ID, PACKAGE_BARCODE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, STATUS, LAST_MODIFY_DATE, BOX_NUM from LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE

SELECT PB.PACKAGE_BARCODE, PT.PICK_TICKET_CODE, TD.ITEM_ID FROM LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE PB LEFT JOIN LDV_PACKAGE_ITEM_REL IR ON(IR.PACKAGE_BARCODE_ID=PB.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_PICK_TICKET_DETAIL TD ON(IR.PICK_TICKET_DETAIL_ID=TD.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_PICK_TICKET PT ON(TD.PICK_TICKET_ID=PT.ID)
PT.PICK_TICKET_CODE='$PICK_TICKET_CODE$'
PB.PACKAGE_BARCODE='$PACKAGE_BARCODE$'
PB.ID=#ID#
GROUP BY PT.PICK_TICKET_CODE, TD.ITEM_ID,PACKAGE_BARCODE

SELECT DISTINCT PB.PACKAGE_BARCODE FROM LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE PB LEFT JOIN LDV_PACKAGE_ITEM_REL IR ON(IR.PACKAGE_BARCODE_ID=PB.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_PICK_TICKET_DETAIL TD ON(IR.PICK_TICKET_DETAIL_ID=TD.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_PICK_TICKET PT ON(TD.PICK_TICKET_ID=PT.ID) WHERE PT.PICK_TICKET_CODE=#PICK_TICKET_CODE#

SELECT PT.WHSE_ID, PB.ID, PB.PACKAGE_BARCODE, PT.PICK_TICKET_CODE, PB.STATUS FROM LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE PB LEFT JOIN LDV_PACKAGE_ITEM_REL IR ON(IR.PACKAGE_BARCODE_ID=PB.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_PICK_TICKET_DETAIL TD ON(IR.PICK_TICKET_DETAIL_ID=TD.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_PICK_TICKET PT ON(TD.PICK_TICKET_ID=PT.ID) WHERE PB.PACKAGE_BARCODE = #PACKAGE_BARCODE#
PB.ID = #ID#

SELECT PT.WHSE_ID, PB.ID, PB.PACKAGE_BARCODE, PT.PICK_TICKET_CODE, PB.STATUS FROM LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE PB LEFT JOIN LDV_PACKAGE_ITEM_REL IR ON(IR.PACKAGE_BARCODE_ID=PB.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_PICK_TICKET_DETAIL TD ON(IR.PICK_TICKET_DETAIL_ID=TD.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_PICK_TICKET PT ON(TD.PICK_TICKET_ID=PT.ID ) WHERE PB.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
select LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE ( ID, PACKAGE_BARCODE, CREATE_USER_ID, STATUS, LAST_MODIFY_DATE ) values ( #ID#, #PACKAGE_BARCODE#, #CREATE_USER_ID#, #STATUS#, #LAST_MODIFY_DATE# )
statements.update: update LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE set box_num =( select nvl(max(box_num),0)+1 from LDV_PACKAGE_ITEM_REL l left join LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE b on(l.package_barcode_id=b.id) left join v_wms_pick_ticket_detail d on(l.pick_ticket_detail_id=d.id) left join v_wms_pick_ticket pt on(d.pick_ticket_id=pt.id) where pt.PICK_TICKET_CODE='$PICK_TICKET_CODE$') where ID=$ID$
update LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE set STATUS='NP' where ID = #ID#
update LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE set PACKAGE_BARCODE = #PACKAGE_BARCODE# where ID = #ID#

update LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE set
box_num =(select nvl(max(box_num),0)+1 from LDV_PACKAGE_ITEM_REL l left join LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE b on(l.package_barcode_id=b.id) left join v_wms_pick_ticket_detail d on(l.pick_ticket_detail_id=d.id) left join v_wms_pick_ticket pt on(d.pick_ticket_id=pt.id) where pt.pick_ticket_code=#PICK_TICKET_CODE#)
where ID=#ID#

update LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE set
box_num= box_num-1 where id IN( select distinct l.package_barcode_id from LDV_PACKAGE_ITEM_REL l left join v_wms_pick_ticket_detail d on(l.pick_ticket_detail_id=d.id) left join v_wms_pick_ticket pt on(d.pick_ticket_id=pt.id) where pt.pick_ticket_code=#PICK_TICKET_CODE#) AND box_num>#BOX_NUM#

update LDV_PACKAGE_BARCODE set
PACKAGE_BARCODE=#PACKAGE_BARCODE#
LAST_MODIFY_DATE=#LAST_MODIFY_DATE#
STATUS=#STATUS#
BOX_NUM=#BOX_NUM#
where ID = #ID#
